text: Vyacheslav Valeryevich Nedorostkov (; born 5 July 1967 in Stepnoye) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:People from Sovetsky District, Saratov Oblast Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Sokol Saratov players Category:FC Krylia Sovetov Samara players Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Temp Shepetivka players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Ukraine Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Nyva Ternopil players Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Mordovia Saransk players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football forwards
title: Vyacheslav Nedorostkov
